name: Chaos Dragon
description:
You wake up in a forest, and see a mysterious portal before you. You decide to step in. What lies at the end of this route? Play and find out!

This is an RPG inspired roguelite where your character levels up by changing dice you roll with. This game was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam (the theme was "Roll of the Dice").

If you find any bugs, comment them down below, please!
